title: Please Fix Leaver Buster and LOL client thanks.

replies.body:
Seems like your connection plummeted during loading and you weren't able to find the game for as long as the instance was open. Problem with seeing the replay is that Riot do not save game replays, so it doesn't exist.

There is no way for Leavebuster to tell whether you went afk or if your game just failed to start up. To avoid this in the future, then make sure you're connected by the ten minute mark. Leavebuster considers you to be afk if you haven't inputted action for 15 minutes.
